faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to common questions about our burner systems and services.

q1.question: How often should I service my burner?
q1.answer: We recommend annual maintenance to keep your burner performing optimally. In heavy usage scenarios, semi-annual check-ups can be scheduled.

q2.question: How do I create a service request?
q2.answer: You can fill out the 'Contact' form on our website or send us your request via our 24/7 WhatsApp line. You will receive a swift response.

q3.question: What should I do in case of an emergency breakdown?
q3.answer: Mark your request as urgent or call +90 531 625 06 94. Our field team will respond as soon as possible.

q4.question: Which regions do you serve?
q4.answer: We serve all over Turkey. We offer rapid field support in Istanbul, Ankara, Izmir, and their surrounding areas.

q5.question: How can I request a price quote?
q5.answer: Click the 'Get a Quote' button and share your requirements. We will send you a detailed quote within 24 hours.

q6.question: Do you provide training or user education?
q6.answer: Yes, we offer certified training services for burner operation and maintenance. Contact us for schedule and curriculum details.

maintenance.pageTitle: Annual Periodic Maintenance - NASA Technical Services
maintenance.subtitle: For maximum safety and efficiency, our expert team performs comprehensive annual maintenance, cleaning, and flue gas analysis.
maintenance.contentDesc: During our annual periodic maintenance, our expert team covers all critical points of your burner system. We prioritize flue gas analysis to ensure optimal performance and safety.

step1.title: Pre-Inspection:
step1.desc: Assessment of current condition by analyzing facility records and previous maintenance reports.

step2.title: Cleaning & Maintenance:
step2.desc: Cleaning burner components, replacing filters and nozzles, and performing mechanical maintenance.

step3.title: Safety Checks:
step3.desc: Testing and verifying safety valves, pressure switches, sensors, and safety systems.

step4.title: Combustion Performance & Flue Gas Analysis:
step4.desc: Optimizing fuel-air settings, conducting emission measurements, and evaluating performance with a flue gas analyzer.

step5.title: Reporting:
step5.desc: Providing a report with performed tasks, measurement results, recommendations, and scheduling the next maintenance.

maintenance.benefit1: Reduced fuel consumption and increased energy efficiency
maintenance.benefit2: Lower emissions through accurate optimization based on flue gas analysis
maintenance.benefit3: Preventing costs and downtime by detecting potential failures early
maintenance.benefit4: Long-term system durability and extended equipment lifespan
maintenance.benefit5: Compliance with current regulations and safety standards

maintenance.quoteText2: page and get in touch with us. Our professional team will respond promptly.

step1.title: Burner Selection:
step1.desc: Determining the appropriate burner based on fuel type, capacity, and facility layout.

step2.title: Site Survey:
step2.desc: Inspecting the installation area and identifying necessary preparations.

step3.title: Assembly:
step3.desc: Mechanical installation, electrical connections, and system integration.

step4.title: Commissioning:
step4.desc: Initial ignition, combustion tuning, and safety system checks.

step5.title: Training:
step5.desc: Training the end-user on correct operation and maintenance procedures.

monoblok.name: Monoblock Burner
monoblok.desc: Compact design with all components in a single housing.
monoblok.overviewDesc: The Monoblock Burner is engineered for high-efficiency combustion solutions in industrial facilities. With a ceramic-coated combustion chamber and integrated control panel, it delivers maximum performance. Its compact design makes it ideal for small to medium-scale boilers.
monoblok.benefit1: Low fuel consumption and eco-friendly emissions
monoblok.benefit3: Easy control with integrated automation system

duoblok.name: Duoblock Burner
duoblok.desc: Modular design, high capacity, and efficient combustion control.
duoblok.overviewDesc: The Duoblock Burner, with its dual-block design, meets high-capacity combustion needs while simplifying maintenance. Each block can operate independently‚Äîif one block goes offline, the other continues running, ensuring uninterrupted production.
duoblok.spec2: Fuel Type: Natural Gas / LPG / Fuel Oil
duoblok.benefit1: One block maintains operation even if the other fails
duoblok.benefit2: Energy efficiency through high capacity adjustment
duoblok.benefit3: Easy maintenance and quick spare-part supply
